## RemotePlaywright.chromium property

Reference to an object implementing the [BrowserType](https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-browsertype) interface from playwright allowing to control chromium.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
chromium: BrowserType<ChromiumBrowser>;
```
